resources.string: TalkBack provides spoken feedback so that you can use your device without looking at the screen. TalkBack can be helpful for people who have difficulty seeing the screen.

How to use TalkBack
• Swipe right or left to move between items
• Double-tap to activate an item
• Drag 2 fingers to scroll

How to turn off TalkBack
1. In Settings, tap Use TalkBack. There will be an outline. Double-tap it.
2. On the confirmation message, tap Stop. There will be an outline. Double-tap it.
